sourcesContent:
import React , {useRef, useState }from 'react'; import '../styles/booking-detail.css' import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from 'reactstrap' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import bookingData from '../assets/data/booking' import calculateAvgRating from '../rating/avgRating'; import avatar from '../assets/images/avatar.jpg'; import Booking from '../components/Booking/Boooking'; const BookingDetail = () => { const {id} = useParams(); const reviewMsgRef = useRef('') const [bookingRating, setBookingRating]=useState(null) // ini statik data setelah kita memanggil semua API dan menyimpan data dari database const booking = bookingData.find(booking=> booking.id === id) // properti distruktur dari objek booking const {photo, title, desc, price, address, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize} = booking const {totalRating, avgRating} = calculateAvgRating(reviews); // format date const options = { day: "numeric", month: "long", year: "numeric" }; // submit request to the server const submitHandler = e=>{ e.preventDefault() const reviewText = reviewMsgRef.current.value // setelah akan memanggil api kita } return <>

{title}

{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ( "Not rated" ) : ( ({reviews.length}) )} {address}
{city} Rp.{price} / per person {distance} k/m {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

{/* booking review */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

setBookingRating(1)}> 1 setBookingRating(2)}> 2 setBookingRating(3)}> 3 setBookingRating(4)}> 4 setBookingRating(5)}> 5
{ reviews?.map(revies=>(
Bambang

{new Date("01-18-2023").toLocaleDateString( "en-US", options )}

5
Tempatnya Bagus
))}
{/* booking reviews end */}
}; export default BookingDetail;
